profile:
EcoLife Home Improvements Inc. has a solid reputation for quality and craftsmanship in the home renovation industry. One of the first to bring the true eco renovation or ECO-VOLUTION concept in Northern Ontario, EcoLife has always recognized that True Energy Efficient technology and quality materials can maximize your home's heating and cooling efficiency while helping reduce residential carbon footprints. We offer one of the best windows in the industry with our Triple Glazed package with Foam Injection Vinyl Window Frames with the best U-value and R-Value ratings in the home improvement sector.

EcoLife Home Improvements Inc is 100% Canadian owned and operated and we also only install Canadian building materials.

Eco Life Home Improvements offers the following services: Windows, Entrance Doors, Patio Doors, Garden Doors, Garden Windows, Exterior insulation, Vinyl Siding, Faux stone, Asphalt Shingles, Metal Roofing Systems and Decking.
